text: Francis Smerecki (25 July 1949 â€“ 7 June 2018) was a French football player and manager. He was known for playing with Limoges. He managed Guingamp and national youth team. He was born in Le Mans, France. Smerecki died on 7 June 2018 at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile on French federation official site *Profile Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Footballers from Pays de la Loire Category:French football managers Category:People from Le Mans
title: Francis Smerecki
